task_name: Research AI Platforms and LLM Services to Complete Missing Tool Documentation
context: to complete missing documentation for 10 AI/LLM tools with discovered_needs_review status
description: Comprehensive research task to complete missing data for 10 AI platforms and LLM services (Google AI Studio, Grok, MiniMax, OpenRouter, Genspark.ai, Cove.ai, Smithery.ai, WHALESWING, Pollo.ai, Vectal Pro). Uses YouTube Video Research Prompt methodology aligned with Remote Helpers November 2025 AI Agents & Agentic Workflows strategic initiative. Outputs fully documented tool JSON files with API integration patterns and ROI analysis for multi-model access strategies.
dependencies: Access to YouTube, Perplexity AI, and Google Search
Permission to update tool JSON files
success_criteria: All TBD fields across 10 tools populated with verified data
API integration patterns documented for OpenRouter, Google AI Studio
8-12 relevant videos identified for high-priority tools
Comparison matrix created for LLM platforms (Claude vs ChatGPT vs Gemini vs Grok)
Subscription renewal recommendations for Google AI Studio, Grok
Archive recommendations for low-value platforms (Cove.ai, WHALESWING, Pollo.ai, Vectal Pro)
All 10 tool JSON files updated and validated

steps.name: Review research requirements and prioritize tools
outputs: Research priority order: High (OpenRouter, Google AI Studio) > Medium (Grok, MiniMax, Genspark) > Low (others)

steps.name: Execute search for high-priority AI platforms (OpenRouter, Google AI Studio)
outputs: 8-12 videos for Google AI Studio Gemini API
API documentation for OpenRouter multi-model access

steps.name: Watch top-scored videos and extract API integration patterns
Quick research for low-priority platforms (determine archive vs keep)
Create LLM comparison matrix and OpenRouter ROI analysis
outputs: OpenRouter cost-benefit analysis vs direct API access

steps.name: Update all 10 tool JSON files with complete documentation
outputs: 10 updated JSON files with zero TBD fields

steps.name: Document API integration patterns and create recommendations
Validate JSON files and create summary report

checklist.item: OpenRouter multi-model API access evaluated (yes/no + rationale)
Google AI Studio Gemini API integration patterns documented
LLM comparison matrix created (Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, Grok)
Archive recommendations provided for low-value platforms
Pricing structures fully documented from official sources

roi_metrics.decision_support: Enables evaluation of OpenRouter ($50-200/month) vs direct API access
roi_metrics.cost_optimization: Identifies platforms to archive, saving $50-100/month in unused subscriptions
roi_metrics.strategic_alignment: Supports AI Agents & Agentic Workflows initiative with MCP integration insights
